The service attitude is also great. If I can give him ten ten, star!The affinity is also full, it is very trustworthy to drink what to drink to him!Friends also think that the proportion of his tune is great!The presentation of wine shows the intention of the bartender, thank you Enxi ❤️ It is really a lucky day!

Original:

This is a fashion store.
